channel.title: Need hoster please!
channel.description:
Well,
1st off... You get Co-Owner if you host it, 2nd... you get to become good friends with me :) 3rd... you're helping me + alot of other people out!
Well here is my story... I use to be able to host my own servers, edit my own servers, until one day my parents got a new router, and now i can't host anymore! i can still edit, which i find really fun. I just can't host, So heres how the server is... It's based off of Project Czar, I edited alot of it, It has working specs, veng, barrage, almost every silab item, and i fixed pretty much everything, and, you can train mage with a Lever now! i made that because when ever i played project czar i would always have to buy like 1k runes, then the server shuts off, well not anymore brother! because i made a ::runes command also! :) So anyone who would like to host a pretty fun server, then add me on msm... Brandon@hotmail.com
Note:tell me if this is the right section please...

item.description:
@T_A_Z_Z wrote:

Skiller, did you get the server?

item.title: Need hoster please!
item.dc:creator: @skiller_noob1 skiller noob1
item.description:
@skiller_noob1 wrote:

Hey, I could host for you. What’s your server ip? PM me it.
